title: Springtime Bullies: Special Illustrated Edition
description: The Peacock Writers are a fluid group of authors from around the world. Bringing various talents in stories, poems and artwork to you, in this book, to help raise money benefiting children's charities. “Springtime Bullies” represents our sixth book in a bi-annual series published with Autumn/Winter and Spring/Summer themes. We chose bullying as our Spring theme because it seemed to be so recently prevalent in the media and personal lives of the authors. We hope that your family and friends find these stories and poems helpful in learning to deal with this difficult subject and will cherish them for years to come. All proceeds from this series go to charity. Please join the Peacocks in making a child's dreams come true.
author: Gwenna D'Young
